public class RectangleBuilding
extends java.lang.Object

Class that creates a rectangle that makes the basic structure of buildings

Constructor Detail

RectangleBuilding

public RectangleBuilding(int bottom,
                         int left,
                         int floors)
Constructor for objects of class RectangleBuilding that must include parameters for the dimension of the building

Parameters:
bottom - a y value representing the bottom location of the building
left - a x value representing the far left side of the building
floors - number of floors the building is (each floor is 50px)
Method Detail

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
Creates a gray rectangle and draws it on the screen

Parameters:
g2 - the graphics object used to draw the building
